title: Form Registration
description: Please fill out the following registration form to register as a new user.
name: Full Name
name_trim: Name cannot contain spaces at the beginning or end
password_trim: Password cannot contain spaces at the beginning or end
password_same: Password and Confirm Password must be the same
email_trim: Email cannot contain spaces at the beginning or end
phone_number_trim: Phone number cannot contain spaces at the beginning or end
phone_number_number: Phone number must be a number
success_register: Registration Successful Please Check Your Email To Activate Your Account.
error_server: Sory Proble Server, Try again in 5 minute.
error_registered: Sory Problem in Server, Error Register. Try again in 5 minute.
error_sending_email: Sory Problem in Server, Error sending Email. Try again in 5 minute or Change your Email.
